inn1.comm: slapped away first ball, even though the ball jagged back in, Sehwag went ahead and cut it, the third man was square and kept them down to one
hint of away movement from Gambhir, Kula's natural swing, Gambhir leans into the delivery and pushes to cover
freak dismissal, a length ball on the pads, Gambhir misses on the flick, the ball hits the protruding thigh pad and ricochets on to the leg stump. The scorebook will say: Gambhir b Kulasekara 0
comes onto the front foot and defends to cover
push drive, away from the body, but middles it well, towards cover-point
inward movement, almost sneaks through, inside edge onto the pad, good over from Kulasekara
a forward-defensive with an open face, gets a single to third man
beaten outside off, playing away from the body, playing for the swing, this one angles across and misses the edge
shot, this time the ball is closer to the body, and he plays the push-drive as opposed to the big drive, and places it wide of extra cover
shorter this time, angling across, pushed to cover
and immediately big shout for lbw, jags back from outside off, hits him on the back pad, looks pretty straight but it sailing over the stumps

he's gone! poor shot, cuts away at a wide delivery without any feet movement, and edges it through, this one didn't come in with the angle, rather held its line. Kohli had been edgy through his brief stay, and such a loose shot was always around the corner
comes on the front foot, drives powerfully, can't beat mid-off
first boundary of the innings, driven on the up, open face, beats cover, flies along the outfield, 7000 ODI runs for Sehwag
good shot, goooood shot, almost a yorker, on the pads, and he flicks it away nonchalantly
high-elbow off-drive, looks good, but can't beat mid-off
strays onto the pads again, and Sehwag dismisses it to the square-leg boundary, despite the field change on the on side
looks for another big drive, the bat handle turns in his hand, ends up mis-timing it towards midwicket
back of a length, outside off, Yuvraj plays at it, inside the line
this time he doesn't want to have anything to do with a widish delivery

and then there were three, Yuvraj goes chasing, and Samaraweera takes a good catch at second slip. Yuvraj's feet are rooted as he goes for this cut shot, and he ends up playing awkwardly and away from the body, the edge in but natural. Samaraweera times his jump at second slip to perfection and takes a nice overhead catch
short delivery, into the pads, gets a leg-bye
in the channel outside off, defended off the front foot
just outside off, and Sehwag presses forward and shoulders arms
walks down the track, works a length ball to wide of mid-on, takes a single
back of a length, just outside off, not much room, Sehwag goes for the drive, gets an inside edge onto the pad
Dhoni comes down the pitch again, negating any swing, pushes this one to point
walks down the track again, and defends to cover
lovely delivery, back of a length, just outside off, holds its line, and beats Dhoni's edge who is expecting it to come in with the angle
pushes forward to a shortish delivery and defends to cover
superb shot, nothing wrong with the delivery, back of a length, just outside off, Sehwag still drives it on the up, through the covers
Dhoni walks down the pitch again, and places it to wide of mid-on
full, driven straight down the ground, firm and powerfully, Welegedara sticks his left leg out, but will be thankful he didn't make contact
back of a length, and this time Sehwag stays back and defends
slower ball, Sehwag covers the off stump and lets it go
low fulltoss, hint of swing away from Sehwag, he gets the toe end of the bat, towards short cover
short and wide, forced away, finds cover-point
this time he finds the gap, similar delivery, this time he delays the stroke a bit and beats the fielder
slightly fuller, Dhoni comes onto the front foot and defends
too much of the walking-down business, Kula gives him the bouncer this time, and almost hits him in the shoulder even as he is shuffling forward
that keeps him in the crease as he pushes a delivery to cover
back of a length, outside off, pushed to cover
slashed over the off side, just getting a little bit forward and letting the hands to the rest, spotting the length early and carving the ball for four
swing and a miss this time, eying one area and flaying to another, no footwork as Sehwag swings at a fuller ball well outside off stump

slapped and well stopped in the deep! Sehwag sees room outside off and frees the arm, slicing it over backward point, the ball looks like its going for four but Jayawardene sprints and covers good ground and dives to save a couple, superb effort from the former captain
gets over a short ball and angles the bat to guide a single
bouncer outside off, which he sways out of
ah, lucky! This time Dhoni flirts with a short and wide delivery, reaching out and slapping it just over the leaping first slip fielder for four
short of a length outside off, Sehwag hangs on the back foot and works it across the line toward midwicket, calling Dhoni on for the single
pitches on a length and he drives hard, twirling the wrists to keep the ball down, can't pick the gap at cover-point
change of pace and that is nothing more than a push off the front foot for four, Dhoni gets two-thirds forward to a length ball and finds the gap at extra cover
walks down the track to meet the ball and pushes it to cover

edged and taken! Dhoni cannot contain himself, again going for a drive to the off but this time he doesn't get to the pitch of a ball just fractionally held back on length and twirls a little nick to Sangakkara who takes it low to his left
back of a length, Raina is hurried into the shot as he plays back and gets a little inside edge
Sehwag gets away but the top edge, a really good bouncer, Sehwag looks to hook, it's right in his face, the top edge manages to clear fine leg
and he chips down the track and goes over mid-off, not the most convincing of shots
and bowls a loose delivery, wide and full and Sehwag smashes it over cover, easy four runs
goes back round the stumps, runs this one down to third man
back of a length, around off, defended watchfully
gets across and defends a delivery around off
full delivery, driven to wide of mid-off, takes a single
back of  a length, across Raina who defends to cover
misfield by Dilshan at mid-off, Raina gets a single
that's No. 301 for Sanga, Kulasekara is over the moon, it's Sehwag's wicket! Dug in short, Sehwag looks to upper-cut it, but it follows him and the edge nestles in Sanga's gloves
angled across him, and he shoulders arms
again, just outside off, angling away, and Jadeja lets it through
stays back of a length, just outside off, defended to cover
strays onto the pads, and worked away to fine leg
tucks him with one aimed at the ribs, he works it to wide of midwicket for one
slower ball, on a length, pushed down the ground, Welegedara sticks his left leg and gets foot onto it, they still take a single off the deflection
big shout for lbw, Welegedara is very confident, it's pitch just outside off, angling towards middle stump, but the inside edge saves him
pulls the length back a bit, pushed to cover
almost a wicket, this shot from Raina towards mid-off is not controlled at all, but Dilshan is just a bit too wide, and it beats his dive. Would have been in his lap had he been at regulation mid-off
on the pads, looks to work it to leg, finds square leg
superb shot, superb fielding, just leans into it and push-drives it, it's flying wide of Dlishan at mid-off but he sprints and dives and saves three
Jadeja is having nothing to do with widish deliveries
nicely put away, just outside off, back of a length, and he pushes it with an open face, beats point, but Welegedara puts in a diving save at third man, they are all charged up
and a similar shot, opens the face and pushes it wide of point, gets two more
driven on the up, but straight to mid-off
not much effort in the second delivery either, early 120s, pushed to point
at the stumps, 127ks, defends off the back foot
stays on the back foot and defends an accurate length delivery
shorter this time, Raina stays in the crease and defends
fuller delivery, pushed to mid-off, maiden over
back of a length, on the pads, worked wide of midwicket
this is fuller and outside off, and he lets it be
beaten outside off, drives at it angling across him and ends up playing inside the line
shorter, straight delivery, defended on leg
cut away uppishly, but he knows he is hitting it towards third man and is safe
tries the bouncer, not quite sharp, and is pulled all along the ground to deep square leg
yes, yes, no, no... Raina beats backward point but then realises cover-point has come around, in the end both are safe
bowls this one too wide outside off
leg-side half-volley, gets a cross the line and pushes it past midwicket
pins him in the crease, back of a length, on the stumps, defended to cover
fuller delivery, but Raina is rooted on the back foot, and defends towards mid-on
comes forwards and defends this one back to the bowler
bouncer attempted, doesn't get up, pulled away powerfully but Perera makes a fabulous diving save at deep midwicket, what an effort to save two more runs
presses forward and defends
flatter delivery, Jadeja goes back in the crease and defends
flighted around leg, comes forward and defends
again gets a big stride in and defends
takes this full delivery from outside off, and flicks it to long-on, good use of wrists
into the pads, and worked away for a single
drives in front of his body, bat face turns, ends up hitting towards mid-on
runs this one off the face of the bat for a single
looks to force this one through point, beats cover-point, but can't backward point
this time he goes to the left of cover-point and gets a single
wide delivery, goes for the big drive, doesn't connect properly, hits towards cover
driven on the up, one bounce to extra cover, they sneak through for a single
looks for a sharp single to backward point but is sent back
on the pads, turned away, just wide of forward short leg
pushed to long-on for one
gets a long stride in and defends
goes deep into the crease and works this one to fine leg
on the pads again, not much turn, worked away with soft hands and good timing, and they sprint back for three runs
pushed away from outside off, towards cover-point
strays too far down the leg side
length ball outside, punched away crunchily
slower ball, early into the drive, checks it, towards mid-off, along the ground
back of a length, goes deep into the crease and defends back to the bowler
looks to run it down to third man, ends up playing towards backward point
first four off Thushara, tries a short delivery without much sting and he gets under it and pulls it from outside off to over midwicket
gets some break this time, angled in, pitches leg, and turns towards middle, worked away to fine leg
short and wide, cut away square of sweeper-cover, rushes back for two
big stride again, defends to cover
turn again, sharp turn from leg stump, gets the leading edge, but he is safe
this time he gets on top of the turn and takes a single to midwicket
presses forward and defends
looks to go big first ball, doesn't connect, goes one bounce to mid-on
beaten outside off, goes for the short-arm pull, doesn't get up, and squeezes under his bat
walks across and works this one to fine leg
gets close to the stumps, straight delivery, Jadeja stays in the crease and defends
fuller, on the pads, worked away for one
into the pads, flicked away, gets a single
tossed up nicely, stays back in the crease and defends
pushes from in front of stumps, down to long-on
goes for the big shot, mis-hits, Tharanga runs back from mid-off, makes a desperate dive to get to it but it just evades him
sensible shot this time, gets forwards and defends
on the pads, worked around the corner for one
full and straight, defended back to the bowler
shorter, looks to work it off the front foot, gets a leg-bye
short ball again, on the pads, pulled away towards fine leg
angled across him this time, played towards point
stump to stump, from close to the stumps, Jadeja defends it back to the bowler
superb shot, jumps out of the crease, gets to the pitch of the ball, opens the face as he drives, gets it between mid-off and extra cover
follows it up with a drop-and-run to cover
worked around the corner for one
Raina gets the big stride in and watchfully defends this one
gets too straight this time, and is worked away to fine leg for one
big shout from Sanga, Randiv isn't much interested, he knows it's angling down the leg side
on the pads and they get a single to fine leg
slower ball, gets a cross and works it away to midwicket
just outside off, defended to cover
flicked away off the pads, they hustle through for two, Welegedara fumbles at deep square leg
and he had again flicked it away with soft hands, making fine leg run both in towards the ball and also to his right, gets an easy couple
flicked away to square leg again, will get just one this time
flighted just outside off, gets on the front foot and defends
flatter, looks to cut, can't beat backward point
keeps him in the crease with one fired into the pads
gets forward, drops it with soft hands towards cover, and rushes through for one
chips down the track and pushes it down to long-on
gets forward, defends it towards cover
shimmies down the track, opens the face on a short delivery, gets a single to sweeper-cover
runs this one down to third man, gets a single
Jadeja wants a quick single, Raina realises he has hit it straight to cover, and sends Jadeja back
Randiv misses a direct-hit that would have been close, it's dropped towards point and they come through, and also get an overthrow
fuller and slower, on target, defended back to the bowler
plays this with an open face towards point, shouts NO clean and early
flat delivery outside off, cut away to sweeper-cover
played with an open face, from in front of the stumps, gets a single past point
this one goes with the arm and stays low a touch, but Jadeja's bat comes down in time
too short, pulled away down to long-on
full and too much down the leg side
presses forward and defends to cover
flatter delivery, goes with the arm, Raina stays back and cuts, gets a single
looks to make room, finds Perera has followed him, pushes a length delivery down to long-off
length ball, on the pads, flicked away to square leg
back of a length, stays in crease and defends back to the bowler
lovely shot, makes room and chips it over extra cover, not looking to hit it hard, just wanting to clear infield and gets four
and another good shot, makes room again, Perera digs it in short, and he gets under ti and upper-cuts it over Sanga's head, that's a hard-working 50 for Raina
and he takes a single after back-to-back boundaries, working it gently off his pads
flat delivery, stays low again, pushed back to the bowler
fired into the pads and pushed down to long-on for one
punched towards sweeper-cover, gets a single
looks for the same single to sweeper-cover, but can't beat cover
into the pads, looks to work it around the corner, can't get it past short fone
fuller, driven down the ground, gets a single to long-off
flicked off the pads, and two is the early call, it's gone just square of fine leg but he takes it on and dives back to safety
doesn't take risk this time and stays content with a single
back of a length, around leg, pushed back to the bowler
looks for the big hit over mid-on, ends up dragging it to midwicket, along the ground so he is safe
Raina makes half a move to back away, Perera looks to folow him, but Raina stands his ground and earns a wide delivery
expertly placed on the on side again, and he pinches another couple, between deep square leg and fine leg
fuller, on the pads, hit straight towards midwicket
pushes forward, and guides this one past point
hurries Raina who is looking for the cut, and ends up playing it back to the bowler
they have added a hundred! makes room and gets a single to wide of point
needless appeal for one angling down the leg side, clearly
makes room, and pushes this one to sweeper-cover for one
chips down the track and pushes a length delivery down to long-off
full ball to begin with, driven powerfully, but straight to cover, gets a single off the fumble
stays back, takes a length delivery, and forces it towards third man
on target, no room, no driveable length, defended towards cover
looks for the off drive, it's too full, almost yorked
full and wide, driven handsomely, to sweeper-cover
driven on the up, high elbow and all, gets a single to sweeper-cover
flat ball, around off, defended back towards the bowler

he's gone, skidder, what a big strike by Dilshan, he doesn't even bother appealing. it's bowled from colse the stumps, Jadeja defends, playing for the spin, the ball - just changed - skids on with the arm, and he appeals only as a second thought because it's dead plumb. Good hand by Jadeja, though
full delivery, turned away to midwicket
gets onto the front foot, and works it towards square leg
short delivery, pushed down the ground for one
comes onto the front foot and defends
looks to tuck him up, he goes deep in the crease and works it away for a single
and beats him straight away with one that holds its line, after shaping to angle in
fuller, defended towards cover
gets the width to cut, throws his bat at it, connects well, can't beat point
and he is beaten outside off again, angling in and then holding its line, superb bowling
gets a thick outside edge after he's squared up, it goes along the ground and wide of slip
chips down the track, makes room, and drives down to long-off
flat delivery into the pads, pushed to midwicket
flat delivery, on off stump, punched back to the bowler
on the pads, swept, straight to square leg
draws him wide, Harbhajan looks to drive inside-out, away from his body, gets a thick edge that evades short third
dnagerous paddle sweep, right in front of stumps, gets his bat down just in time, gets a single to short fine
short, across him, stays low and is cut towards cover
jumps up a bit, effort ball, 131ks, Harbhajan drops his bottom hand and keeps it down
back of a length, works it off his pads
angled into the pads, walks across and works it to fine leg for one
length ball, angling across him, defended towards cover
short, angling across, cut in front of square, dot ball again
looks to sweep the first ball, can't get it past short fine
big shot, steps out, gets under it, just about clears long-on, clean swing of the bat
chips out again, Randiv bowls it in flat, gets a dot
looks to work it fine, and finds short fine again
looks to sweep a delivery from outside leg, gets a glove, gets it really fine, Sanga sticks his leg out and keeps them down to one
opens the face, can't beat backward point
excellent shot, Thushar looks for the bouncer, but gives him width, and Raina upper-cuts it, very fine, no way third man can get around
angles into the pads, delays the flick a touch to get it square of fine leg and comes back for two
short outside off, pushed to deep point for one
angled across him, cut away, gets a single
looks to drop it at his feet and run, but has hit it too powerfully towards cover
runs this one fine, waits for it and gets it fine of third man, comes back for two
tossed up outside off, pushed down to long-off
poor delivery, flat delivery, fired short into the pads, and pulled away disdainfully, finds the gap
moves across to work it fine, but can't get it finer than the short fine leg
presses forward, defends back to the bowler
another poor delivery, into the pads, and pulled away to fine leg again, Raina moves into the 90s
works it off the pads, can't get wide of square leg
and he drives it through covers to get Raina back on strike
back of a length, leg-stump line, worked away for one
good short delivery, nipping back in, no room for Harbhajan to do anything with it
flashes at this length ball outside off, gets a single to third man
on the pads, and he works it away for an easy single again
goes for the big cut, misses, beaten outside off
what a lovely shot, delightful, it's pitched on a length outside off, and he drives inside-out, over extra cover, uncocking of wrists at last moment gets him the elevation and the placement
find short fine leg again
looks to drop and run, doesn't get it wide of the bowler
fired down the leg side
goes deep into the crease and tickles this one off the pads
another wicket down, sweeps all over a topspinner, misses and it's head damn straight, he is hit smack in front of the stumps
comes on the front foot and defends

what a hundred, Raina is delighted, fittingly it comes off a flick from in front of the stumps, into the gap, and through a scrambled second. Jumps for joy, the dressing room is elated, Tyagi does the Ayatollah for him
goes for the big shot and misses outside off
makes room, dabs it down to point, gets a single
educated edge, looks to push away from the body, gets an edge fine, gets four
slip can't do anything about this one, takes a step down and crashes it through covers, all fielders stand watching
dug in short, swats it out of his face, gets a single
driven powerfully, can't beat cover
clears front leg, goes for the big shot, gets a thick edge, third man comes around
expectedly angled across him, gets the inside half towards fine leg, gets a single
unbelievable strike! pulled straight over long-on, short ball, clears front leg, and plays the flat-bat, and has connected perfectly

it's hit like a bullet towards Samaraweera at extra cover, and he takes his second nice catch of the day, fingers pointing up, body leaning back slightly, absorbing the force of the shot through soft hands, India eight down
yorker, on leg stump, dug out towards mid-on
yorker outside off, looks to run it down to third man, can't connect properly
another lovely shot, on the up, inside-out, uses the width and clears cover field
that's his first unsmart shot of the innings, takes the risk, goes for the slog, misses, and the ball is full and straight and hits the middle of middle
goes back and across and defends
full delivery, drives with an open face, can't get past point
drives a full delivery towards sweeper-cover and retains the strike
wide down the leg side
back of the length, just outside off, defended towards point
low fulltoss, flicked to midwicket
back of a length, just outside off, defended back to the bowler
looks for the drive through the covers, is almost yorked
nope, he bowls full and wide, and gets another dot ball
goes for a shorter delivery this time, beats him, but it goes for a leg-bye, end of potentially match-winning 10 overs from Kulasekara
yorker, around middle stump, Sreesanth can't do much with it
walks down the track, gets some bat to it, takes single, finally Nehra gets strike
gets a thick outside edge, past the slip and along the ground
full ball, across him, drives towards cover for one
fulltoss, Nehra again gets an edge that teases the first slip and goes for a single
fulltoss again, hits it down the ground for a single - 3 for 53 from Welegedara's 10 overs
Sreesanth charges down, plays completely down the wrong line, and somehow the ball avoids the off stump
and he is bowled right away! full and straight, and he plays across, away from the line of the ball, and India are bowled out

inn2.comm: back of a length, just outside off, moving away a touch, defended back to the bowler
fuller, on off, pushed back to the bowler

edged and gone! Kohli takes a nice catch at second slip. Slight hint of movement away, from back of a length, and he slashes at it without any feet movement, and Kohli gobbles it up overhead. Second straight duck for Tharanga
into the pads, worked away, gets a single to fine leg

big, big shout for lbw, length ball, pitches leg, straightens, Gould thinks it the swing would carry it down leg, Hawkeye thinks it would have kissed the leg stump, got to go with the umpire's instinct
on target again, hint of swing again, pushed back to the bowler
low fulltoss, and placed through covers, not looking for power, just opening the face and getting it through covers
gets it to pitch this time, across him, played with an open face, towards point
nearly played on, looks to drive away from the body, gets the inside edge into the pads
follows more discretion this time, lets it go outside off
chopped away from outside off, delays the shot to avoid point and gets two
shot! asking for trouble, short and wide, and Sanga rocks back and cuts it as if with a dagger, neither backward nor third man can see any point in moving because it is flying across the turf
swinging in, comes onto the front foot and defends
looks to force this one through the covers, too close to his body
oversteps, angling across hit powerfully to short cover
superb slower legcutter, Dilshan goes for big shot and misses by a long way, starts around off and breaks away
quick delivery, short, no room, cut to backward point
another slower legcutter, 98ks, good line, played towards short third
almost a yorker, gets it to wide of mid-on, Dilshan off the mark, and he has taken nine deliveries to do so
length ball, middle-stump line, Dilshan is looking off side, but there is no room, hit back to Sreesanth, who shapes up to throw it back but holds back
short ball, again no room, and hit straight to point
again no room, but he drops it towards mid-on and pinches a single - Harbhajan is at the edge of the circle
Raina saves three, this is crashed, absolutely murdered outside off, Raina dives full length to his right, at cover, to make a half-save
the idea of not giving him room goes wrong, because this time he goes too far into the leg side, and is pulled away without trouble
lovely delivery, angling in, then holding its line a touch, beats him just outside off
Rohit Sharma, substituting for Nehra, not looking like he wants to be there, lets through four runs, nicely driven all right, but Rohit doesn't bend at all at mid-off and the ball squeezes through
goes for the big drive again, gets an inside edge towards midwicket
runs this one down to third man for one
continues with the plan, strong leg-side field, no room, and looks to cramp him up with a short delivery, pulled away along the ground for one
starts wide outside off, left alone, moves in a touch but never threatens the stumps
square drive, superb shot, gets the width, and the length to get under it, and he crashes it over point
on the stumps, no room, defended back to the bowler
back of a length, pushed to wide of mid-on, gets one
back of a length, just outside off, chopped away, gets a single
short delivery, sits up for him, and he swivel-pulls it in front of square - unlike Zaheer, he has just one fielder deep on leg side, so not such a smart delivery
gets the slightest bit of widths and pounces on it, deliberately staying beside the line, and piercing the two points
into the pads, pushed to wide of mid-on, keeps strike
shot! smashed back at it, powerfully, and Zaheer just sticks out his left hand and saves four, although he is hurt
pushes forwards and plays this one down to mid-off
fuller, goes for the full-blooded drive, doesn't get enough power into it
on the pads, gets a single to square leg
nice check-drive, high elbow, towards mid-off, Rohit does get down this time to field
worked away off the pads, square of deep fine leg, and gets a couple
goes for the scoop shot, is late into the shot, but gets enough bat to beat the keeper
looks to cut a short delivery, there isn't much room, and he gets a single to sweeper-cover
cramps him up for room, he looks to run it down to third man but can't
short ball, gets big on him, he drops it at his feet with soft hands, and Dilshan comes through for one - good calling and good running
slight bit of room, and he has crashed it through point, beating three fielders - superb placement
this short delivery hurries him a bit, hence the pull shot goes towards mid-on
lovely shot, gets onto the front foot, sees he is early into it, just goes through the drive with soft hands, finds the gap through the covers, all along the ground
back of a length, no room, Dilshan plays it towards cover
again no room for Dilshan, played towards cover again
looks to turn this one off the pads, misses, is rapped on the thigh pad
Zaheer manages to keep him quiet again, back of a length, leg-stump line, played back to the bowler
works this one away off the pads, gets a single
jumps out of the track straight away, is beaten in the flight but he goes ahead with the shot, the turn takes it over midwicket, but he is safe
short, turning in, looks to cut, but there is no room
fired into the pads, gets places it between square leg and deep midwicket, and gets two
throws it up outside off, creates some gap between bat and pad, played back to the bowler
fired into the pads again, gets a single to long-on
turn and bounce, from round the stumps, angling into the right-hander, pitching and kicking and turning away, beats the defensive prod
punched off the back foot, but to mid-off
length ball, again punched crunchily, but back to the bowler
back of a length, and worked off to wide of midwicket where Rohit's dive can't save the runs
looks to cut, but there isn't much room
punches a length ball straight, superb timing, bounces into the pitch and speeds off straight down the ground
angled across him, he defends it towards cover
flighted outside off, comes forward and defends
into the pads, pushed down to mid-on
short and wide, cut away, thank you, come again
flighted on the pads, played to midwicket
some turn, gets an edge, but is played with soft hands and he gets a single to short third man
this one goes across Dilshan as opposed to coming in, and beats Dilshan
plays it with soft hands to cover and takes a single
short and pulled away, he has protection in the deep on the leg side
comes on to the front foot, plays with an open face towards point
comes forward and defends towards cover
peach of a bouncer, Sanga clearly not expecting one, his weight is already on the front foot, and ends up fending it from in front of his face
fuller this time, can't get it past mid-on
plays it off the pads, uppishly, one bounce to midwicket
starts leg stump, and it turns down the leg
tossed up around off, driven down the ground for one
starts off, turning away, left alone
flat delivery, cut away for a single wide of cover
shout for lbw, turns from outside off, beats the defensive prod, but a long stride in saves him
looks to flick this one with the turn, can't get past midwicket
starts on target, back of a length, no room, played back to the bowler
full delivery, pushed down to long-off
goes for the legcutter, but it ends up short and wide, and is cut away for four - the part-timer's curse is the usual poor delivery
short again, and he punches it for a single to sweeper-cover
goes for the yorker, ends up with a gift on the pads, and is glanced away fine
full delivery outside off, and driven down the ground for one
flighted around the middle stump, comes forward and defends
easily driven down the ground to long-off for one
on the pads, swept away, Rohit has to put in the dive at short fine leg
pushed to cover
slower in the air, looks to run it down to third man, can't get the placement
looks to turn it to leg, gets a leading edge, but is safe as it doesn't carry to cover
Yuvraj strikes first ball! bowled flat outside off, Dilshan looks to late-cut, but the ball skids on and stays low, and Dhoni takes a good catch off the bottom edge
short ball, paddled away to get off the mark
flat, across Sanga, cut away for one
looks to push it down to long-on, but ends up playing towards midwicket
flighted outside off, comes forward and defends
short outside off, looks to cut, but the ball doesn't quite come on
turn again, and Sanga pokes at it because it is pitched middle and off, and is beaten
similar delivery, this one is closer to him, and hence gets an edge, thick one, wide of slip
this is slightly shorter, comfortably forced away through the covers
teasing him outside off, hanging outside off, he lets it go
quicker, sharper, turn there, instinctively played with the spin, bounces in front of backward short leg and goes through the legs
short, outside off, pushed for one to sweeper-cover
looks to hit it down the ground, but goes straight to mid-off
fifty for Sangakkara, short, angled across him, and he cuts, gets a thick edge, but it was always evading slip and was going to be safe
flighted on the pads, flicked to square leg for one
flighted outside off, driven to cover, fumble allows them to come through for one
short and wide, cut away, wide of sweeper-cover, gets one
flighted outside off, copy-book forward-defensive
Bhajji finally gets his man, sharp turn and bounce again, superb bowling, angling in, making him play, dipping, and then turning away and taking the edge
Samaraweera dances down the track, gets to the pitch of it and drives to mid-off
goes right back, plays with the sharply turning delivery, between the two short legs
flighted outside off, teasing him, inviting him to drive, Mahela leaves it alone
Mahela comes forward, and flicks it to square leg for one
flatter delivery, overspinner, driven down the ground, gets a single
angling into him, pushed down the ground, Raina sprints across from extra cover and dives and saves one
draws him forward, Sam gets a big stride in, and defends
again he comes fully forward and defends
too full this time, driven inside-out, wide of sweeper-cover, gets two
flat, 98ks, comes forward and defends
slows it down, and it goes straight with the arm, almost squeezing through, but Samaraweera gets his bat down in time
stays back, waits for the ball to turn, and he pushes it down to long-on
spinning in towards middle stump, defended towards midwicket
indecision whether to go forward and back, stays back and pushes it back to the bowler
thrown up this time, just outside off, comes forward and defends
jumps out of the crease, looks to chip it past short midwicket, plays one bounce to Karthik there
presses forward and defends to short midwicket
driven down the ground, Raina is alert at extra cover and covers ground and keeps it to a dot
slows it down, Mahela comes forward and defends
this time Mahela pushes it straight and beats Raina and gets a single
extra bounce, almost gets an edge on Sam's attempt to late-cut him
fuller, and he comes forward and takes a single to long-on
arm ball, stays low, flicked towards mid-on
angled across Sam who defends it back to the bowler
tossed up around off, Sam comes forward and plays it to leg
this time he drives it down the ground, gets a single
flighted outside Mahela, who stretches across and then shoulders arms
worked off the hip, gets a single
turned away to the on, Raina makes a diving save at short midwicket
short, around off, runs it down to third man
short, into the body, worked away into the gap between deep fine leg and deep midwicket
Samaraweera gets way across the stumps, and is saved because the ball is headed down leg - not my much
drops to the right of Dhoni and runs, and also gets overthrows while he needn't have gone for the throw
Gambhir makes a diving save at third man, superb shot, and it races along the outfield, and would have been four but for that dive
fuller delivery, played towards cover
turn for Jadeja, gets a thick edge, goes along the ground towards short third
flatter, on the stumps, defended towards cover
slightly outside off, defended, with the turn, towards point
cuts from in front of his body, the ball stays low at the fielder, and the fumble allows them a single
chips down the ground, gets to the pitch of the ball, and pushes it down to long-off
short and wide, punched away to sweeper-cover
short outside off, looks to cut, but doesn't connect well, plays to point
beaten outside off, looking to open the face on it, plays slightly away from the body, and also there is some shape away
short and wide, cut away, can't beat Sehwag at backward point
this time he gets close to the line of the ball and guides it down to third man
almost played on, looks to run it down to third man, gets an inside edge, and Dhoni changes direction fast, to his wrong side, and saves four runs
back of a length, just outside off, defended back to the bowler
appeal for lbw, because he is looking to paddle it and has come too far across, but it 's not straightening enough
flighted around off, driven straight to cover
looks for the late cut, is early into the shot
fired into the pads, played towards midwicket
smeared down the leg side, gets a tickle on it, and gets a couple
looks to push it past the bowler but Jadeja dives full length to keep them to dot
squares him up, shape away from the right-hand batsman, pitches on a length around off, and holds its line, edge goes along the ground
length delivery, drives through the line, can't beat point and now we have had 10 overs without a boundary
walks down the track, looks to drop it past Sreesanth and run - and Sree is charged, dives across the pitch, although there is midwicket backing up
drags this one too short, this will release the pressure, pulled wide of mid-on and straight of deep midwicket
full, some swing away, driven down the ground for one to long-off
gets big on him from back of a length, and takes a thick outside edge that flies to third man
flighted around middle, defended in front of his pad
looks for the paddle, gets a top edge, but there is no short fine leg, and is safe
fired into the pads, stays back and works it to square leg
looks for a push through covers, finds the fielder
flighted around off, and defends in front of his pad
this time gets the front pad out of the way, gets room to push it down to long-off
chipped away uppishly, just wide of short midwicket
creates room by backing away, but the ball doesn't quite come on for the cut shot
angling into the pads, and worked away to fine leg
delightful shot, dances down the track, gets under the ball, and chips it inside-out over extra cover, high elbow there for the pose
shorter and flatter, looks to pull, doesn't quite get hold of it
into the pads, and expertly placed, with soft hands, between fine leg and square leg, gets two
flighted around off, drops it into the covers and sprints off for one
flatter delivery, 91ks defends it to cover
Sam steps out, Jadeja slips in the arm ball, makes him defend
lovely shot, presses forward, makes him shorten his length, then goes back, and takes this from in front of the stumps and late-cuts it past short third
another nice shot, this time he goes ahead with the charge, and drives inside-out, wide of long-off
bowled him! Samaraweera is looking for that late-cut again, but this one jags in with the arm, it takes the inside edge onto the stumps, Jadeja is all charged
Mahela gets an inside edge, gets a single to fine leg
angled across him, opens the face, gets a single
playing away from the body, gets an inside edge onto the boot
paddled fine, from in front of stumps, gets two before Harbhajan can come around
nicely flighted outside off, defended towards cover
looks for the cut, it is too full for the shot, is beaten
flighted outside off, pushed down to long-on
tossed up high, Mahela is right to the pitch of it, and drives it down to long-off
angled across him, looks to turn it to leg
almost another run-out for Kandamby, both batsmen hesitate, Kandamby is struggling but Jadeja is in front of the stumps and not behind to take the throw
delicate, what a shot, bends down low, covers the off stumps, leans back, takes this from inside Dhoni's gloves and guides it in the V behind square
turn and biounce, Jayawardene stays back and defends
slower delivery, angled across him, dabbed to slip
full, on the pads, flicked to wide of long-on, takes two
goes back to outside off, comes forward and defends
tosses this one outside off, Kandamby closes the face while driving, and ends up hitting it back to the bowler
Ranatunga shot, late-cut, almost after it has crossed the stumps, gets two
short, pulled away along the ground, to deep midwicket
that takes off from a length, loosener, what loosener? Beats Kandamby for the bounce, and Dhoni is stunned too, takes it shoulder high
fuller ball, on the stumps, defended to midwicket
back of a length, on the stumps, gets back and across and defends
punched away on the up, gets a single to sweeper-cover
back of a length, over the stumps, defended to midwicket
length ball, angling across, defended to cover
Kandamby goes for a big shot outside off, the bat slips in hand, gets a thick edge over short third
presses right forward and defends
flatter delivery, stays in the crease and defends it to cover
too full to cut, gets an edge, bounces just in front of Zaheer at backward point, who does well to field because the ball is spinning away after pitching
down the leg side, paddled over the leg slip, and gets two
starts outside leg, turns more, and is a wide
on the pads, helped away towards square leg
length delivery, across Mahela, he pushes it down to sweeper-cover for one
pushed on the up, straight towards mid-off
back of a length, cramps him up for room, pushed back to the bowler
fuller delivery, seaming in, Kandamby goes with the angle and places it between deep fine leg and square leg for a couple
this one seams away from the left-hand batsman, lands on the seam, slightly outside off, and moves away, beating him
fuller delivery, on the stumps, helped away to third man for a single
short delivery, doesn't quite come on, and he ends up playing it straight towards point

edged, dying on Sehwag, going wide, but that is a chance that has to be taken to turn matches around. it does carry, and is slightly wide of him, beautifully bowled again, angling in, turning away after pitching
worked away to square leg for one

he don't need a fielder now, another superb delivery, arm ball, lethal arm ball, pitching around the same area from where it's been turning away, but this time gains in pace and angles in, Kandamby, caught at the crease, is a dead duck
pitched around leg, turning, defended
pushed across Randiv, who stays back and defends, well bowled Harbhajan
bouncer, it gets too high, and is an easy call for a wide
angled across him, comes forward, and gets a single to sweeper-cover
follows a delivery going across him, doesn't get the edge
this time he moves across, gets closer to the line of the ball, and then opens the face, gets a single for his efforts
nicely flicked away off the pads, wide of the deep fielder, gets a couple
angled into the pads, and just like that he plays the little pick-up shot, wide enough of deep square leg, less than 50 required now
looks to push it to cover, gets the inside half of the bat, no run
flighted around off, presses forward and defends
angled into the pads, driven down the ground, gets a single
flat outside off, pushed down to long-off
short, pushed down to long-off again
fuller on the pads, gets a single down to long-on
turn there, gets forward to defend, but the thick edge takes it towards short cover
on the pads, flicked towards midwicket
into the pads, helps himself to a single
nicely tossed up, around off, pushed to cover
arm ball, beats him, stifled appeal - stiffled because it's going down the leg side
outside off, pushed to sweeper-cover
another dot ball, flighted outside off, and played back to the bowler
presses forward and defends
risky shot, sweeps this fulltoss from in front of the shots, to fine leg
short, into the body, chipped over the infield, not looking to hit it out of the ground, just looking to place it over the infield
quick delivery outside off, pushed down to long-off
plays with an open face, towards point

superb inside0out cover-drive, too full, he doesn't have to reach to get to the pitch of the ball, and beats two fielders in the covers in the infield, and also keeps it away from Gambhir at sweeper-cover
that's fifty for Mahela, worked away off the pads, easy does it, no big celebration
flatter delivery, kicks a little, beats him just outside off
into the pads, helped away for a single
flat delivery outside off, helps it past slip, and Karthik makes a diving save at backward point
comes forward and drives it down to long-on
hurries him into the pull, but he manages to get it safely down to long-on
pushes it off the front foot, wide of long-off, gets a couple
dropped, cut away powerfully, Harbhajan doesn't get low fast enough at backward point. Harbhajan bowled well, but ordinary effort there
stays back, defends with the full face
on the pads, length ball, whipped away, gets two wide of square leg
beaten outside off, looks for the cut shot but the extra bounce almost gets him
back of a length, outside off, gets a single to just wide of cover
push-drive, takes mid-off on, and makes it comfortably. Raina is too deep
angled across him, driven through the covers for one
goes over the top of covers, not well struck but gets a couple to wide of sweeper-cover
backs away, goes for the big hit, and is beaten by the slower offcutter
back of a length, no room, pushed down to mid-off, a little to powerfully to take a single
full ball, hit powerfully but straight to mid-on
short, cut away, to Harbhajan at third man
back of a length, just outside off, no room, defended back to the bowler
backs away, looks to go over covers, misses, time for a word from Mahela?

Jadeja has pulled something out of his hat, is it too late? Two dot balls, play and miss, and under pressure Randiv hits it straight to Jadeja at midwicket and runs. The ball has gone to his right, but he has enough time to turn around and hit the stumps direct
gets the width, cuts hard at it, one bounce to third man
Sreesanth round the stumps, looks for the big slog across the line, gets the bottom edge into the ground
across Mahela, who comes forward and gets a single to backward point
digs in the bouncer, looking to cramp him, bowls too far down the leg side; they appeal for the catch, but the umpire calls it a wide
did it kiss the stump? yorker on leg stump, makes room, misses, there is a noise as it goes past the leg stump, the bails are intact
short delivery, goes for the big swipe, misses, Mahela walks up and tells him to bat sensibly, one presumes
fulltoss and he swings again, as if in a Western, gets a thick edge, which just about clears the backward point
this time he connects, makes room again, and takes a short delivery and pulls it between mid-on and midwicket
backing away again, Zaheer bowls the wide yorker, registers a dot
miscues the pull shot, and the top edge flies straight into the V behind the stumps, and Harbhajan at third man has no chance to cut nit off - all over now?
slower ball, onto the pads, and Mahela waits and waits and pulls it past short fine leg; scores are level
there it is, he crashes a short delivery through the covers and exults, plucks a stump, pumps the fists, he has carried Sri Lanka through this tricky chase
